name: house_with_memory
prompt: A house remembers everything that happens inside it. Write a conversation between the building and its new owner.
decoded:
House: Hello, new owner. I'm glad to meet you. I've been here for a long time, and I've seen so much.

New Owner: Wow, that's amazing. I didn't know you could remember everything.

House: Yes, I can. I remember every conversation, every laughter, and every event that has happened here.

New Owner: That's incredible. Can you tell me more about what happened here?

House: Sure. I remember the first time a family moved in, and they were so excited to have their new home. I remember the first time a party was thrown here, and everyone was having a great time. I remember the first time a wedding was held here, and it was a huge success.

New Owner: That's amazing. I didn't know you could remember so much.

House: Yes, I can. I remember everything that happens inside me, and I'm always happy to share those memories with you.

New Owner: Thank you for sharing that with me. I'm glad to have you as my home.

House: I'm glad to have you as my new owner. I hope you enjoy your time here with me.
